---
category: news
title: "Machine learning system can predict bipolar disorder 4 years before it manifests in young people"
excerpt: "An international team of doctors have developed a machine learning system which can predict the development of Bipolar Disorder up to 4 years before onset in young people: at age 18 it was able to predict which individuals would develop the condition at age 22."
